/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades bathed in the soft glow of streetlights. Cars of different shapes and colors navigate the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. Overhead, power lines crisscross against the sky, a testament to the city's infrastructure. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, encapsulating the city's vibrant energy and architectural diversity.
